channel.title: Cherry-Blossoms on Stroll
channel.description: Recent content in Cherry-Blossoms on Stroll

item.title: Kyoto, Japan
item.description:
Overview

Wander through centuries-old temples, serene gardens, and lantern-lit alleys of Gion.

Highlights

  • Fushimi Inari gates at dawn
  • Philosopher’s Path in cherry blossom season
  • Kaiseki dinner in a machiya townhouse

Practical

Best in Marchâ€“April or November; bikes are perfect for flat city rides.
